answers.answer: If you have had thise symptoms at the same time id call the doctor. I have had dizzy spells and researched it and it said if you also have a headache and or if nauseous call the doctor... could be blood pressure
I think you need to go to the hospital or doctor and get a checkup. Your symptoms are the same as Mine when I had preeclampsia with my last pregnancy.
It sounds like you could possibly have high blood pressure or the flu. You should get checked out if the head ache doesn't go away or the dizzyness.
Sounds like dehydration.  Most people think they drink enough water when in reality they dont. Drink some water and gatorade. Lay down on your left side as well.

I was experiencing the same things 2weeks ago. I ended up going to the ER bc I felt as if id pass out. Turns out, I needed fluids and my potassium was low. Id go just to be safe. Hope you feel better.

I feel that way a lot my midwife told me its because my pregnancy is almost over and my blood pressure is elevated from just carrying a child plus she's pushing in everything. She suggested drinking ice cold water and laying down or at least putting my feet up as often as possible. It you feel you're going to faint sit down and call your doc or go to the er. I fainted early in my first pregnancy and it was not fun

I agree with above^^^ could be your blood pressure or dehydration. It could also be your blood vessels thickening again (you're getting closer and closer!) To give baby more oxygen, so you'd get less oxygen to your brain making your dizzy/sick feeling. Nausea comes back in the later weeks as well, it did for me with my first baby and it's slowly coming back with this baby. After hitting the 30 week mark things just get miserable! I hope you get to feelin better soon hun! We Don't have much longer! =)

I think I pushed myself too hard yesterday.I cleaned our two bathrooms while i wasn't feeling too good and I'm guessing it kicked my butt. Last night my hubby rubbed my back for a little and that seemed to work. Thanks ladies, if it continues today I'll definitely go get checked

question: Anyone else feel dizzy or kind of out of it? All day I've either had a headache, been nauseous or just really hot. Now I'm feeling really dizzy especially when I close my eyes. What do you think it could be? I'm pretty sure I'm not dehydrated, I drank enough water today.
title: Dizzy 32+2
